01.Name: Briyani
01.Description: A famous, traditional, rich-flavored dish, layered with rice, mutton and thick spicy gravy...

02.Name: Paneer Butter Masala
02.Description: Rich, creamy and delicious paneer, mixed with exotic masala gravy and a splash of butter. Best served with Naan or Parotta...

03.Name: Butter Naan
03.Description: Delicious Naan bread, Sizzled with Butter...

04.Name: Egg Fried Rice
04.Description: Rice Stir-Fried with egg and healthy vegetables, with a nice Chinese touch...

05.Name: Noodles
05.Description: freshly-made hakka noodles mixed with exotic spices and vegetables...

06.Name: Masal Dosa
06.Description: The popular South-Indian Dish, consumed with spicy and delicious potato masala...

07.Name: Manchurian
07.Description: A semi-gravy dish with delicious and tasty vegetable balls...

09.Name: Parotta
09.Description: Layered, delicious and Popular South-Indian dish... Famous in our outlets..

10.Name: Shawarma
10.Description: A traditional dish made of Marinated Chicken served with whole meal bread with colourful vegetables and spices...
